archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0179
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to perform all actions I need to do via e-SIM, so that I can use Vodafone on eSIM if I wish

properties.value: What type of actions do you mean? Swap SIM to eSIM, block SIM? All actions available for regular sims should be available for eSIMs. A replace sim between regular and eSIM and vice versa should be supported.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
